data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Goal! Jorgen Strand Larsen gives Groningen a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 6, Bart van Hintum instrumental with a fine assist.
Tesfaldet Tekie (Sittard) has received a yellow card from Paulus van Boekel.
Goal! Groningen extend their lead to 0-2 through Jorgen Strand Larsen.
In the minute 28, Bart van Hintum with an assist there.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Lazaros Rota is on a sub for George Cox for Sittard.
Kevin Hofland is making the team's second substitution at Fortuna Sittard Stadion with Emil Hansson replacing Sebastian Polter.
Wessel Dammers is booked for the away team.
In the minute 54, An attacking Sittard player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Mats Seuntjens pulls one back for Sittard from the penalty spot.
Sittard make their third substitution with Samuel Moutoussamy replacing Lisandro Semedo.
In the minute 62, The away team replace Alessio Da Cruz with Gabriel Gudmundsson.
Mo El Hankouri is replacing Patrick Joosten for the away team.
Goal! Bart van Hintum extends Groningen's lead to 1-3.
In the minute 79, Great play from Ahmed El Messaoudi to set up the goal.
The away team have replaced Jorgen Strand Larsen with Remco Balk. This is the third substitution made today by Danny Buijs.
It's 1-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Tomas Suslov is on a sub for Daniel van Kaam for Groningen.
